p: In Mozambique, there are several plants with antimalarial potential, such as: Alepidea amatymbica Eckl. & Zeyh., Adansonia digitata L., Acacia nilotica (L.) Delile, Acacia karroo Hayne, Bridelia cathartica Bertol., Euclea natalensis A.DC., Lippia javanica (Burm.f.) Spreng., Momordica balsamina L., Rauvolfia caffra Sond., Spirostachys africana Sond., Senna occidentalis (L.) Link, Salacia kraussii (Harv.) Harv. and Zanthoxylum capense (Thunb.) Harv. [ 9].
